long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Webcomic Reader is a browser extension designed to enhance your webcomic reading experience. Navigate your webcomics with arrow keys, track your progress automatically and have it sync to your Chrome Account! All while the next comic image is being pre-loaded in the background for faster reading.
